name: cycleops-verification-poc
description: Demonstrates methodology for verifying black hole status and source code

scripts.verify-blackhole: npm ci && npm run setup && npm run verify
scripts.setup: npx ts-node ./node/os && dfx stop && dfx start --clean --background && dfx deploy blackhole --argument '(principal "qc4nb-ciaaa-aaaap-aawqa-cai")' && npm run remove-controllers-local
scripts.remove-controllers-local: dfx canister update-settings blackhole --remove-controller $(dfx identity get-wallet) && dfx canister update-settings blackhole --remove-controller $(dfx identity get-principal)
